name: Rob Tillman

jv_history.partner_name: Rob Tillman - Leadership Advisor | Certified Executive Coach
jv_history.source_quote: Rob Tillman Leadership Advisor | Certified Executive Coach | Executive Recruiter | CFO Practice Leader | Former Founder & CEO Managing Partner

Los Angeles, California, United States (US) ... ### Founder Keynote Speaker at UNIGNORABLE (Current)

Nov 2020 - Present • 5 years and 2 months Los Angeles Metropolitan Area Company: 1-10 employees •

what_you_do: Rob Tillman is an award-winning business coach who supports small business owners and solopreneurs in navigating entrepreneurship.
who_you_serve: Small business owners, solopreneurs, and professionals transitioning to self-employment.
social_proof: Named 2025 Best Business Coach by Best of Small Business Awards (presented by Small Business Expo); included on Top 10 entrepreneur list in USA Today and Top 20 in Men's Journal; Forbes Technology Council member; featured in Tech Times and Technology.org.
business_focus: Business coaching and innovation advisory for small business owners and solopreneurs.
service_provided: business coaching, keynote speaking, innovation consulting, career mentoring
